channel.title: Need help with a couple things!
channel.description:
ok so i need help with the following things:
1. How to change buying limit from stores - by that i mean when u go to a store and press buy x amount of items; i want to be able to buy more than just 100 cuz the limit on my source is 100 and i wanna change that
[IMG]http://i230.photobucket.com/albums/ee239/kosmo50_2007/0005.png[/img]
2. How to make character lose items when it dies - right now when my character dies it doesnt lose anything and i wanna change that but i don't know how, i know i got to search for "isDead()" but i don't know wat to do after that
3. How to fix this glitch - when i click on the general stall or any other stall to steal from i lose connection from my server, but when it logs back in i get the exp + the money, how do i fix it so it doesn't kick me out?
*NOTE - I AM A BEGINNER TO ALL OF THIS SO IF YOU COULD EXPLAIN IT SLOWLY STEP BY STEP I WOULD APPRETIATE IT
Thanks in advance :)

item.title: Need help with a couple things!
item.dc:creator: @kosmo50 kosmo50
item.description:
@kosmo50 wrote:

i searched and there arent others and i compiled but it still says the same thing >.<[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 08, 2009, 01:55:51 pm[/size][hr]still looking for help to solve these problems

item.title: Need help with a couple things!
item.dc:creator: @Tonys_Bax Tonys_Bax
item.description:
@Tonys_Bax wrote:

Make sure there’s no other codes that handle buying 100 items.

(Search for the text again)
If there’s no other codes, compile and it should work correctly

item.title: Need help with a couple things!
item.dc:creator: @kosmo50 kosmo50
item.description:
@kosmo50 wrote:

ok i found this on my client.java

if (EnteredAmount < 1001) buyItem(XremoveID, XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); else sM("You cannot buy more than 1k items at a time."); } else if (XinterfaceID == 3900) { //Shop if (EnteredAmount < 1001) buyItem(XremoveID, XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); else sendMessage("You cannot buy more than 1k items at a time.");

it used to say If(EnteredAmount < 101) but i changed it to 1001 but it still doesnt work, is this wat i was supposed to change? or is there something wrong in this code?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a couple things!

item.title: Need help with a couple things!
item.dc:creator: @Tonys_Bax Tonys_Bax
item.description:
@Tonys_Bax wrote:

Noooo.

When someone says blah class
They mean the java file.

A Class is a compiled java file.
Now, if someone says “blah.class” they mean the class file.

Read full topic

hmm i cant even open the client.class, only client.java

item.source: Need help with a couple things!

item.title: Need help with a couple things!
item.dc:creator: @Tonys_Bax Tonys_Bax
item.description:
@Tonys_Bax wrote:

Easy to do, and good question for beginners.

Here’s a tip.
If you ever don’t know what to do, just search for the text you find in the Client class. It’s USUALLY in there.
Now, in when you get to the method, the integer 100 should be somewhere. since it’s saying you can’t buy more then 100 at a time, change the string for the text you found and change the integer itself.

As for the isDead method, I haven’t worked on a server for around 5 months so I’m not really sure if it is in that method.

The general store problem, sounds like a fault in one of your voids to buy things.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a couple things!
